battleTraits.name: Lightning Reactions
battleTraits.lore: Lumineth possess a natural alacrity beyond that of most rivals.
battleTraits.effect: When players are alternating picking units to use a ****FIGHT**** ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 units instead of 1. Resolve the second ****FIGHT**** ability immediately after the first.

battleTraits.name: Power of Hysh
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Vanari can use their innate arcane abilities to empower their sunmetal weapons.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, until the start of your next turn, attacks made by that unit score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

battleTraits.name: Facets of War
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: The arts of war practised by the Lumineth are subtle, precise and devastating.
battleTraits.effect: You must use this ability at the start of the battle round. Pick 1 ****FACET OF WAR**** ability. That ****FACET OF WAR**** ability can be used this battle round but the other two cannot.

battleTraits.name: Shining Company
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared an ATTACK ability
battleTraits.lore: Numinous light shines from this aelven formation, bedazzling the foe.
battleTraits.usedBy: A friendly unit targeted by that **ATTACK** ability and that has not made a pile-in move this turn.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the attacks that target that friendly unit.

battleTraits.name: Deep Thinkers
battleTraits.lore: The Scinari are renowned for their profound knowledge and thoughtful deliberation.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****FACET OF WAR**** abilities this battle round.

Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly ****SCINARI**** units for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Enduring As Rock
battleTraits.lore: When in a battle trance inspired by the mountain, the Alarith take on the aspect of stone, blades rebounding off their rock-hard skin.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****FACET OF WAR**** abilities this battle round.

Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target friendly ****ALARITH**** units for the rest of the battle round.

battleTraits.name: Move Like the Wind
battleTraits.lore: Hurakan warriors perform gravity-defying leaps to take them away from their enemies.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****FACET OF WAR**** abilities this battle round. Pick up to 3 friendly ****HURAKAN**** units that are not in combat to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Each target can **move** 2D6". It cannot **move** into combat during any part of that **move**, and it cannot use ****SHOOT**** abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Lightning Reactions
battleTraits.lore: Lumineth can think faster, act more decisively and fight more proficiently than any other.
battleTraits.effect: When players are alternating picking units to use a ****FIGHT**** ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 **LUMINETH REALM-LORDS** units instead of 1. Resolve the second ****FIGHT**** ability immediately after the first.

battleTraits.name: Shining Company
battleTraits.lore: Vanari warriors often fight in a grouping that combines the bright light of each soul into a dazzling brilliance that befuddles foes.
battleTraits.effect:
You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****FACET OF WAR**** abilities this battle round.

For the rest of the battle round, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target friendly ****VANARI**** units that have not charged this turn and that have not been picked as the target of the ‘Power of Hysh’ ability this battle round.

battleTraits.name: Power of Hysh
battleTraits.lore: Vanari can use their innate arcane abilities to empower the sunmetal in their weapons, making it burn with a greater intensity.
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if you have not used any ****FACET OF WAR**** abilities this battle round. Pick a friendly ****VANARI**** unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the battle round.

heroicTraits.name: Paragon of Hysh
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘Charge’ ability or a SPELL ability for this unit
heroicTraits.lore: This hero has travelled throughout Hysh and is a scholar of each aspect of Lumineth society.
heroicTraits.effect: You can re-roll the **charge** roll or casting roll for that ability.

heroicTraits.name: Perfect Strike
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.lore: This hero can unleash their might in one deadly attack.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Inflict D3+3 mortal damage on the target.

heroicTraits.name: Masterful Tactician
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS unit wholly within 12" of this unit
heroicTraits.lore: This hero quickly redirects the warriors under their command to plug a gap or exploit a weakness in the enemy line.
heroicTraits.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can **move**, you can use a value of 4 instead.

artefactsOfPower.name: Phoenix Stone
artefactsOfPower.lore: This ancient crystal shatters when the bearer is slain, surging with healing energy and giving them a second chance.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (1)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

artefactsOfPower.name: Silver Wand
artefactsOfPower.lore: This slender wand is covered with winding Lumineth runes.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If this unit is not a ****WIZARD****, it has ****WIZARD** (1)**. Otherwise, add 1 to this unit’s power level.

artefactsOfPower.name: Waystone
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This small sliver of dark rock hovers above the bearer’s outstretched palm, leading them along hidden paths towards that which they desire.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

regimentAbilities.name: Heightened Reflexes
regimentAbilities.lore: The keen senses of these warriors are second to none.
regimentAbilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for friendly units that use a ****FIGHT**** ability immediately after another friendly unit because of the ‘Lightning Reactions’ ability, until the end of the phase.

regimentAbilities.name: Arcane Prowess
regimentAbilities.lore: The Cathallar of this Glittering Phalanx keeps a hidden reserve of aetherquartz to bolster their sorcery in battle.
regimentAbilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Waystone
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This sliver of dark rock illuminates hidden paths around the bearer in stark relief.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Remove your general from the battlefield and set them up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Protection of Hysh
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The caster opens their arms wide, creating a field of glowing energy that protects all of the caster’s allies that are nearby.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of your general to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 7+, the target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Speed of Hysh
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The Cathallar magically empowers their allies to move with light’s swiftness.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 18" of your general, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 5+, double the **Move** characteristic of that unit until the start of your next turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Overwhelming Heat
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The Cathallar summons oppressive heat to sap their foes’ strength.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 24" of your general, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 7+, halve the **Move** characteristic of that unit until the start of your next turn and roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds that unit’s Save characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Heat
abilities.lore: The caster summons oppressive heat to sap their foe’s strength.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Halve the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn, then roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Protection of Hysh
abilities.lore: The caster opens their arms wide, creating a field of glowing energy that protects all of the caster’s allies that are nearby.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, friendly units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

abilities.name: Speed of Hysh
abilities.lore: The caster gestures at a nearby Lumineth regiment, enchanting them so they can move blurringly fast.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS** unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Add 4" to the target’s Move characteristic until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Summon Rune of Petrification
abilities.lore: The caster calls forth a hovering sigil ripped from the crust of the realm underfoot.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Rune of Petrification** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Rune of Petrification** wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Sanctum of Amyntok
abilities.lore: The ground splits around the mage, and the life force of the realm springs forth as a crackling shield.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Sanctum of Amyntok** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS INFANTRY HERO** wholly within 12" of them and more than 3" from all other units and terrain features to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Sanctum of Amyntok** within the target’s combat range, visible to the caster and not in combat. A **Sanctum of Amyntok** has 3 parts that must be set up touching each other so that they form a ring with the target inside.

abilities.name: Summon Hyshian Twinstones
abilities.lore: The caster calls forth two giant crystal teardrops that orbit around each other.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Hyshian Twinstones** endless spell on the battlefield, pick a friendly **LUMINETH REALM‑LORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Hyshian Twinstones** endless spell wholly within 6" of the caster.

abilities.name: Vanari Brilliance
abilities.lore: When the warriors in a Vanari Battlehost stand together, they radiate a dazzling light that protects them from their foes.
abilities.effect: You can use the ‘Power of Hysh’ ability in addition to the other **FACET OF WAR** ability used during the battle round.

abilities.name: Grace of the Hurakan
abilities.lore: Swift and deadly are the warriors of the Hurakan temples, supplicants of Hysh’s glorious winds. They move with the speed of a howling gale, long hair whipping in the rushing air currents.
abilities.effect: You can use the ‘Move Like the Wind’ ability in addition to the other **FACET OF WAR** ability used during the battle round.

abilities.name: Alarith Fortitude
abilities.lore: The Lumineth of an Alarith temple can turn aside enemy blows by making their skin become as hard and unyielding as stone.
abilities.effect: You can use the ‘Enduring as Rock’ ability in addition to the other **FACET OF WAR** ability used during the battle round.

abilities.name: Lore of the Scinari
abilities.lore: In towering crystal spires, the mages of the Scinari caste seek enlightenment by contemplating the nature of magic itself. When they bring their hard-won learnings to the battlefield, their power is terrifying to behold.
abilities.effect: You can use the ‘Deep Thinkers’ ability in addition to the other **FACET OF WAR** ability used during the battle round.
